content: Submit your templates to share them with the {{organizationName}} community.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message encouraging users to submit their templates to share them within the organization's community. It appears in the body of a form gallery tile.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Submit your templates" is better translated as "Odeslat své šablony" rather than "Pošlete své šablony". "Pošlete" implies sending something physically, while "odeslat" is more appropriate for digital submission.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odeslat své šablony a podělte se o ně s komunitou {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation includes a hyphenated 'community-ի'. While understandable, in Armenian it's more common to use a genitive case marker directly attached to the noun, like 'community-ի հետ' (with community).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to 'Ներկայացրեք ձեր ձևանմուշները՝ դրանք կիսելու {{organizationName}} community-ի հետ' or restructure to be more natural.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ໃຫ້ແບ່ງປັນກັບສະບ້ານຊຸມຊົນ' doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'to share them with the community'. A more accurate translation would convey the idea of contributing to the community.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສົ່ງແບບຢ່າງຂອງທ່ານ ໃຫ້ປະກອບສ່ວນເຂົ້າໃນຊຸມຊົນ {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ඔබේ සැකිලි {{organizationName}} ප්‍රජාව සමඟ බෙදා ගැනීමට ඉදිරිපත් කරන්න." is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would be something like "ඔබේ සැකිලි බෙදා ගැනීම සඳහා {{organizationName}} ප්‍රජާއ වෙත යවන්න" or "ඔබේ සැකිලි {{organizationName}} ප්‍රජාව සමඟ බෙදා ගන්න".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ සැකිලි බෙදා ගැනීම සඳහා {{organizationName}} ප්‍රජާއ වෙත යවන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "{{organizationName}}" is maintained in the translation, which might be acceptable depending on the platform and desired user experience. Consider localizing this placeholder if possible.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Explore options to localize the placeholder {{organizationName}} if feasible.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation "Поднесите своје шаблоне да их делите са {{organizationName}} заједницом" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Submit your templates". "Поднесите" implies a formal submission, potentially to an authority, which isn't the intended meaning. A more appropriate translation would convey sharing or uploading.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Пошаљите своје шаблоне да их делите са {{organizationName}} заједницом.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Podnesite' (Podnesite) is archaic and not commonly used in modern Serbian. A more natural translation for 'Submit' would be 'Predajte'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Predajte svoje šablone da ih delite sa {{organizationName}} zajednicom.
